msg_back_up_confirm: Click on the words from your 12-word phrase in the order you wrote them down
msg_back_up_write_down: Write this 12-word phrase down and keep it somewhere safe. Don't lose it! Without your phrase, you can't access your wallet and we can't help you.
msg_select_type_doc: Please select the type of identity document
msg_upgrade_passport: Upload a clear and legible picture of the main page of your passport
msg_upgrade_national_id: Upload a clear and legible picture of the main page of your national id
msg_upgrade_driving_license: Upload a clear and legible picture of the main page of your driver license
msg_upgrade_selfie: Your selfie should be well lit and in focus
msg_upgrade_proof_of_address:
Please use Bank/Card Statement or Gas/Electricity/Water Bill or Official Governmental Documents

The document should display Name, Surname, Street address (Non-P.O Box), Date, Issuer name

The document you provide should not be older than 3 months and should be different from your ID document

Please note that review might take up to 48 hours
